snippet: A number of bankers and financiers were at Arthur Ashe Stadium on Monday to witness tennis history as Andy Murray defeated Novak Djokovic in the men's singles final. But as the night wore on, some turned to unconventional means to stay warm.
abstract: A number of bankers and financiers were at Arthur Ashe Stadium on Monday to witness tennis history as Andy Murray defeated Novak Djokovic in the men's singles final. But as the night wore on, some turned to unconventional means to stay warm.

headline.main: Wall Street Sits Courtside for a Marathon Match
